title: Episode 1-1 Highlight | 3rd-Gen Chaebol Heiress Kim Ji-won X Yongduri Village Elite Kim Soo-hyun, The Truth Behind the Wedding of the Century!
synopsis: A billionaire heiress goes undercover as an intern. A coworker falls for her and proposes â€” but vanishes when he learns who she really is. She brings him back, and they have "the wedding of the century." Three years later, divorce rumors begin...

title: Episode 1-2 Highlights | Kim Soo-hyun's Never-Ending Tears from His Brutal Life in the Queens Family.
synopsis: Baek Hyun-woo, a commoner who married into the powerful Queens Group chaebol, endures constant control from his father-in-lawâ€”pressured to have a baby, sent abroad, and denied even naming rights for his own child. The sons-in-law bond over shared misery while preparing ancestral rites their wives conveniently avoid.

title: Episode 1-3 Highlights | Chaebol Son-in-law Kim Soo-hyun Finally Decides to Divorceâ€”But Then a Huge Problem Arises?!
synopsis: Baek Hyun-woo, exhausted from years of mistreatment by his in-laws, finally decides to divorce his cold wife Hong Hye-in. But just as he announces his decision, she reveals she only has three months to live.

title: Episode 2-1 Highlights | Kim Soo-hyun Secretly Dreams of Escaping His In-Laws' House...!?
synopsis: Hong Hye-in receives a devastating diagnosisâ€”a rare brain tumor with only three months to live. As Hyun-woo processes the news, his friend suggests he use this as an opportunity. But on their wedding anniversary, Hyun-woo shows up with flowers, choosing a different path.

title: Episode 2-2 Highlights | A Rival Appears Between Kim Soo-hyun & Kim Ji-wonâ€”Park Sung-hoon?!
synopsis: As Hyun-woo grows unexpectedly caring toward Hye-in, her college ex Yoon Eun-sung returns to Korea as a powerful business figure. When Eun-sung provocatively tells Hyun-woo about his past feelings for Hye-in, jealousy quietly stirs.

title: Episode 2-3 Highlights | â€»Meticulous Build-upâ€» A Completely Changed Kim Soo-hyun, Now Devoted to Wife Kim Ji-wonâ™¡
synopsis: Hyun-woo's transformation becomes undeniableâ€”moving closer at the dining table, rushing to help during meetings. Hye-in confesses she suspected his motives at first, but seeing him research miracles and cures gives her strength to fight. She vows to survive, if only for his sake.

title: Episode 3-1 Highlights | Park Sung-hoon Interfering with Kim Soo-hyun & Kim Ji-won's Marriageâ€”His Mysterious True Nature?!
synopsis: A hunting dog incident reveals Yoon Eun-sung's disturbing philosophy about 'valuable' vs 'abandoned' lives. Meanwhile, CCTV footage hints at a family betrayal. A flashback to 20 years ago shows a young boy who killed dogsâ€”with an eerily familiar mindset. The episode ends with Hyun-woo discovering Hye-in and Eun-sung had drinks alone together.

title: Episode 3-2 Highlights | Malfunctioning HeartðŸš¨ Kim Ji-won Starts to Fall for Husband Kim Soo-hyunâ™¡.â™¡
synopsis: After a late night together, Hye-in asks Hyun-woo to help unbutton her dressâ€”an unexpectedly intimate moment. As she processes her terminal diagnosis, she realizes her husband might be what she'd miss most. Later, she asks her secretary if it's normal for a married woman to feel her heart race looking at her husband. The answer? 'She must be sick.'

title: Episode 3-3 Highlights | â˜…Romantic Mood ONâ˜… Kim Ji-won's Heart Opens Again to Kim Soo-hyun
synopsis: Hye-in suggests they stay overnight together, reminiscing about when they used to sleep holding each other in a narrow bed. When Eun-sung tries to plant doubt about Hyun-woo's love, Hye-in delivers a powerful definition of love: 'Love isn't sharing happy momentsâ€”it's enduring the unbearable together.' The episode ends with Hye-in kissing Hyun-woo, declaring she'll start doing things she's never done before.

title: Episode 4-1 Highlights | Kim Soo-hyun Falls for His Wife Kim Ji-won All Over Again...â™¡
synopsis: Hyun-woo can't stop his heart from racing around Hye-inâ€”whether she's wiping something off his face or trying on a rare HermÃ¨s vintage dress. He buys her half-price sneakers, justifying it as 'practical,' but his friend sees through him. When Secretary Kim mentions Hye-in spending time with Eun-sung, Hyun-woo insists he's not jealous... while burning the meat he forgot he was grilling.

title: Episode 4-2 Highlights | â™¨Tension Alertâ™¨ Kim Soo-hyun Ã— Kim Ji-won Ã— Park Sung-hoon, Spicy Relationship Dynamics
synopsis: Hyun-woo's jealousy flares when Eun-sung comes to their home for a weekend meeting with Hye-in. He confronts her about letting Eun-sung touch her hair when she hates it from others. Meanwhile, Hye-in shows her fierce side handling an aggressive customer, and surprises everyone by visiting Hyun-woo's rural hometown to win over his father's friends.

title: Episode 4-3 Highlights | "I Was Worried" Kim Soo-hyun's Growing Concern for His Sick Wife Kim Ji-won
synopsis: Hye-in's mother-in-law attacks her with vicious accusations, calling her 'rotten to the bone.' Hyun-woo steps in to protect her. Later, he urges her to tell her family about her illness, but Hye-in reveals her heartbreaking reason: her parents already lost one child. When Hye-in visits his hometown and goes missing, Hyun-woo panicsâ€”only to find her confused and scared, unable to remember how she got there. Her terrifying confession about memory loss marks a turning point in their relationship.

title: Episode 5-1 Highlights | Kim Soo-hyun's Fluttering Heart, Trembling, and Love for Wife Kim Ji-won
synopsis: Hyun-woo helps Hye-in dry her hair with an old hair dryer that needs a special touch. When she worries about her short 'life line,' he dismisses superstition but can't hide his concern. As she asks him to accompany her to Europe for treatment, Hyun-woo fights his growing feelingsâ€”'I can't go back in there. If I do, I won't be able to leave.' A flashback reveals Hye-in's simple dream: to travel with her husband someday.

title: Episode 5-2 Highlights | Kim Soo-hyun Ã— Kim Ji-won, The Couple Who Inevitably Drifted Apart
synopsis: A flashback reveals how Hyun-woo and Hye-in's marriage fell apart. He tells his friend he can't go insideâ€”being near her makes him lose his mind, but not in a good way anymore. Hye-in clears out the baby items, a painful reminder of the child they'll never have. She moves to a separate room. When she waits outside all night for him to come home, she denies it fiercelyâ€”'I'm not the type to wait for anyone.' His response cuts deep: 'I know better than anyone you're not that kind of person.'

title: Episode 5-3 Highlights | Kim Soo-hyun Ã— Kim Ji-won, Confirming Their Unchanged True Love!
synopsis: A flashback shows Hyun-woo's sister trying to break them up, but he declares: 'The person I love now is Hong Hye-in alone.' In the present, when Hye-in is rejected for treatment and disappears, Hyun-woo finds her at the place she loved during their honeymoon. She finally breaks down: 'I cried so much after marrying you.' His response is a tearful apology: 'I should have been by your side.' She admits she just wanted to go homeâ€”with him.

title: Episode 6-1 Highlights | Park Sung-hoon Ã— Lee Joo-bin's Fierce Ambition Targeting the Queens Family ðŸ”¥
synopsis: A childhood flashback reveals Hong Ga-in's calculated ambitionâ€”she targeted the Hong family's son from the moment they met. In the present, a bugging device is found in Grandfather's study, and the receiver is discovered in Hyun-woo's room, framing him. As family accusations fly, Hye-in desperately begs: 'Say it isn't true. Say you don't know.' The episode exposes the dark schemes threatening the Queens empire from within.
